alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 8:15PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF BREATHITT...FLOYD...JOHNSON... MAGOFFIN...MORGAN...AND WOLFE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 815 PM EST, a snow squall was over Gullett, or over Salyersville moving southeast at 15 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Perlie and Flat Fork around 820 PM EST. Salyersville, Lakesville, Stringtown, Cyrus, Leatha and Wheelersburg around 825 PM EST. Mason and Brownlow around 830 PM EST. Burning Fork, Mashfork and Falcon around 835 PM EST. Bradley, West Royalton Station, Skaggs, Sublett, Conley Station, Carver, Carver Station and Tiptop around 840 PM EST. Royalton, Conley and Ballot around 845 PM EST. Marshallville, Ivyton, Swampton and Duco around 850 PM EST. Gypsy and Riceville around 855 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
